member.summary: Converts the string representation of a Guid to its Guid equivalent. A return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.
member.param: A string containing a Guid to convert.

member.name: T:FSLibrary.KnownFolders
member.summary: Class containing methods to retrieve specific file system paths.

member.name: M:FSLibrary.KnownFolders.GetPath(FSLibrary.KnownFolder)
member.summary: Gets the current path to the specified known folder as currently configured. This does not require the folder to be existent.
member.param: The known folder which current path will be returned.
member.returns: The default path of the known folder.
member.exception: Thrown if the path could not be retrieved.

member.name: M:FSLibrary.KnownFolders.GetPath(FSLibrary.KnownFolder,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the current path to the specified known folder as currently configured. This does not require the folder to be existent.
member.param: The known folder which current path will be returned.
Specifies if the paths of the default user (user profile template) will be used. This requires administrative rights.
member.returns: The default path of the known folder.
member.exception: Thrown if the path could not be retrieved.

member.name: M:FSLibrary.StringConverter.BuildTypeMap
member.summary: Build the singleton type map in a typesafe manner. This map is a dictionary that maps a pair of types to a common type. So typeMap[typeof(float)][typeof(uint)] will return float, while typemap[typeof(char)][typeof(bool)] will return string.
